name: Castle Sweeper
description:
First build. Might fine bugs. Looking for feedback.

Win by revealing the entire map and eliminating all enemies.

Road - Used to connect buildings to Castle. The House, Tower, Trader and Mine must be connected to function

Wall - Used to delay enemy.

House - Used to provide population. The Tower, Trader and Mine require 1 population for each building placed.

Scout - Used to scout the fog. Place in a fogged area to understand what is nearby. Red indicators for enemy camps and green indicators for resources.

Tower - Used to defend against enemies.

Trader = Used to buy resources

Mine - Used to collected resources. Place on resource, if connected will provide one lump amount of resources.
